Class AbstractMavenTaglibReportRenderer

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReportRenderer
io.github.weblegacy.maven.plugin.taglib.AbstractMavenTaglibReportRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MavenReportRenderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
TagreferenceRenderer, ValidateRenderer
public abstract class AbstractMavenTaglibReportRenderer extends AbstractMavenReportRenderer
An abstract class to manage report generation of this plugin.
Author:
ste-gr

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractMavenTaglibReportRenderer

      protected AbstractMavenTaglibReportRenderer(Sink sink, Locale locale)
      The class-constructor.
      Parameters:
      sink - the sink to use.
      locale - the wanted locale to return the report's description, could be null.

  • Method Details

    • getMessageString

      protected String getMessageString(String key)
      Gets a string for the given key from the resource bundle with the defined locale. If the locale is null, then the default-locale is used.
      Parameters:
      key - the key for the desired string
      Returns:
      the string for the given key with the defined locale
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if key is null
      ClassCastException - if the object found for the given key is not a string
